title: S2 Ep38: The challenges of improving public sector management
itunes:title: The challenges of improving public sector management
description: Imagine an intervention that combined funding, best practice delivered at scale, and near-universal compliance. Should this guarantee it will succeed? Not necessarily, according to a study of a program to improve quality in Indian schools. Abhijeet Singh talks to Tim Phillips.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
